title: T206 tougher backed HOFers (Moved to ebay)
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: T206 tougher backed HOFers (Moved to ebay)
posts.post_content:
Hello all,

I am clearing out some of the T206 HOFers that aI have dups of the front or back of.  I have the following for sale at the price next to the cards.  I would also consider trade for beater HOFers with odd backs or silver coin.


Cards are delivered as follows: ALL CARDS MOVED TO EBAY 7/24/11
PSA 4 EPDG Marquard Thighs with lines $400
PSA 4 American Beauty 460 Marquard Follow Through $400
SGC 50 EPDG Bresnahan Bat $190

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
Offers always welcome.  I want some COIN!!!!!!!
